property.name: mondrian.retroweave
property.description: Tells mondrian to use retroweaver even if the JDK is later than 1.4

target.name: help
target.echo: You must specify a specific project target when using the ANT build. Targets are one of the following: - all Cleans, compiles all classes, and runs a simple test. - compile Compiles functional classes only. - clean Deletes build output. - test Runs a simple test. - info shows configuration info

target.name: resolve-workbench-runtime-deps
target.description: Resolves runtime dependencies not required for compilation.

target.name: apologise
target.echo: Actual JVM Version (${java.runtime.version}) does not match requested (${requested.java.version}); skipping compile for this JDK. If you wish to build for this JDK, modify ${unix.script}.

target.name: FoodMartTest
target.description: Runs a few queries using the FoodMart schema.

target.name: test-only
target.description: Runs all JUnit tests, using the given database connection in {mondrian.foodmart.jdbcURL}.

target.name: generateDiffRepositoryJUnit
target.description: Generates explicit Java testcases from .ref.xml files

target.name: version
load-foodmart
target.description: load the foodmart database from the data file using the Mondrian loader. Assumes empty database exists

target.name: doczip
target.description: Builds a zipfile of the documentation, which can then be deployed to sf.net. See also doc/deployDoc.sh.

target.name: javadoc-strict
target.description:
Generates javadoc as part of the nightly regress, to make sure that all javadoc references are valid.
Javadoc is known to produce errors against JDK 1.4 and 1.5; it runs clean against JDK 1.6.

javadoc.author: true

target.name: javadoc-with-ydoc
target.description: Generates javadoc for public site; verbose: includes diagrams and hyperlinks to source code

javadoc.author: true

fail.message: Javadoc reported warnings or errors; see javadoc-complaints.log for details: ${javadoc.complaints}

target.name: war
target.description: Creates mondrian.war based upon jpivot.war. Assumes that mondrian.jar exists (use 'jar' target)

target.name: deploy-war
target.description: Deploy WAR with JPivot to web server

target.name: derby-war
target.description: Creates mondrian-embedded.war based upon jpivot.war for Derby with embedded database.

target.name: deploy-derby-war
target.description: Deploy WAR with JPivot to web server

target.name: war-no-jpivot
target.description: Creates mondrian.war. Assumes that mondrian.jar exists (use 'jar' target), and lib contains ant.jar, junit.jar etc.

target.name: deploy-no-jpivot-war
target.description: Deploy standalone WAR to web server
